SEARCH
Package com.example.chicksevent

Class NotificationTest

java.lang.Object
com.example.chicksevent.NotificationTest
public class NotificationTest extends Object
Unit tests for Notification.

These tests are designed to run entirely synchronously and without any main-thread dependency. By mocking Firebase Realtime Database and the Task API, we ensure deterministic behaviour of Notification.getEventName() and Notification.createNotification() methods without awaiting asynchronous callbacks.

Key Behaviours Verified

  • createNotification() correctly writes to the expected Firebase path and payload
  • Constructor getters return consistent values for all fields
  • getEventName() properly resolves the event name when found in mock snapshots
  • Graceful handling of missing or unmatched event IDs (returns "NO NAME")

Testing Approach

  • Mocks FirebaseDatabase.getInstance(String) to prevent real Firebase initialization
  • Injects FirebaseService mocks using reflection to isolate test scope
  • Replaces Task.continueWith(Continuation) with synchronous lambda evaluation

All Firebase references and snapshot traversals are simulated to guarantee full control over test inputs and outputs, ensuring safe execution in local JVM environments.
